title: Looking for a High gold, Low Plat Top laner.
body: We will probably be practicing once or twice a week depending on schedules at night on the weekend (Central Time). This teams goal will be to climb the elo ladder. Looking for someone who is reliable and will show up when he/she says they will. Post below if you are interested and ill add you.

replies.body:
IGN: Primojrqt
Position: Adc/ Top
Top Champs: Top- Gnar, Hec, Rumble, Mao
                        Adc- Vayne, Jinx, Lucian, twitch
Time Zone: Pacific
Do you have Curse Voice (required): Yes,
What skills do you bring to the team: I bring a player who is wanting to better himself in anyways that also benefit the team, meaning that if you need a shotcaller, more of a ultility player or simply a hard carry. I will try to excel that helps the team succeed. I had took a small break and came back last week as Silver 3 and within a weak I jumped to plat 5 simply by just a more understanding view at the game and match ups.

Sounds interesting...
My Resume:
Rico Senpai
-Only have preference to Top lane and Jungle
-Have on record, and sources I can cite, of beating two diamond 5 top laners in separate matches
-Have ~2000 games played as Panth alone. 
-Joined League Post Season 2/Season 3, so I have seen the transitions within the game

my 
Final Note: MMR is high, BUT, and you will see from researching me, I don't play ranked Solo Queue at all as I am patiently waiting for Ranked Teambuilder to come online. Doing ranked teams is a special case though, and I am a team player. :)

Anyway, let me know if you ever wanna have a trial run King Spadel X. It'd be fun.
